Articles.Content:
Floor 4008: after being rocked by floor 4006 a wooden hatch falls into floor 4007 opening the path here to floor 4008. Here you find a warp core that has had its magnetic containment damaged by the emp from floor 4006 and is in active breach. Good luck next floor!

195408052023

oo floor 4008 tops the new page!

Edited August 6, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Floor 4009: You quickly reach into your bag of holding and pull out a miniature Enterprise and a shrink ray. You shrink the the warp core and put it in the ships containment field. You then stand on the ship and ride it up to the next floor.

Floor #4,010: As you arrive aboard your small spaceship, you see something interesting… a whole row of stairs! But, only one of them leads to the next floor… good luck.

Edited August 6, 2023 by Kerbalsaurus

Floor 4011: the investigation team into said tiny starship crash. Admittedly its a little investigation and likely to not find anything big.

212408052023
Floor 4012: The tiny starship insurance office. You wait in a line to make your claim. Strangely it appears to be run by Vogons.
Floor 4013. You have the insurance. Now you are insurgent.

Floor 4014: Quarks Bar (from st ds9)

121208062023
Floor 4015: Gluonic Cocktail

Floor 4016: ....Is the ultimate drink to wash down the Nuclear Pasta (of which there's quite plenty to go around)

Edited August 6, 2023 by JadeOfMaar

Floor 4017: a holosuit

131108062023
Floor 4018: the sun, the whole thing, all of it.
Floor 4019: A cold room to help you  recover from the sun exposure.

Floor 4020: a single incandescent bulb

034608072023
Floor 4021: An indoor Ski Resort. You spend hours skiing, enjoying the view from the ski lift and spending the night snuggled up by the fire.

Floor 4022: It's just white walls, but every single number in existence is written on the walls in red crayon. Except that the number of numbers is infinite, so the whole of the walls is covered in red crayon and the walls are just red

Floor 4023. A centrifuge floor. Every part of this floor except the lift is rotating fast.

 

Surprised how AlamoVampire didn’t get 4000.

Floor 4024: a sign stating i gotta sleep at some point so yeah lol

124608072023
Floor 4025: Two thousand square meters of space completely covered in fox hair and radioactive sludge.

Floor 4026: a single dimly glowing zombie bulb.

175408072023
Floor 4027: a dimly glowing zombie

Floor 4028: a warmly warm

183008072023
Floor 4029: A chamber room that is 0°K

Floor 4030: A chamber that is infinitely hot

Spoiler

(Planck_temperature)

Floor 4031: jenny (im referencing something and another thread is very close to referencing this too)

034508082023
Floor 4032: A Jack Donkey, wondering where the Jenny went.
